title: The Illusion of Rationality: Tacit Bias and Strategic Dominance in Frontier LLM Negotiation Games
summary: Large language models (LLMs) are increasingly being deployed as autonomous agents on behalf of institutions and individuals in economic, political, and social settings that involve negotiation. Yet this trend carries significant risks if their strategic behavior is not well understood.
